name: Intan Sayang
greetingText: I like the way you smile & your voice. sehat-sehat yaa syg & semangat teruskii!
text1: Hari ulang tahunta hari ini dii' :D
textInChatBox: Selamat ulang tahun dek! Semoga harimu indah.. ...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text6Content: That's why I made this website for you!
wishText: May all your dreams and wishes come true on this special day yah Intan Sayang ;)
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click this, kalau mauki lihat dari awal lagi.
